name: getMessagesByChannel
description: Get message history for a channel

X-Ably-Version.description: The version of the API you wish to use.

format.description: The response format you would like

$ul: **clientId**: The [client ID](https://www.ably.io/documentation/core-features/authentication#identified-clients) of the publisher of this message.
**connectionId**: The connection ID of the publisher of this message.
**data**: The string encoded payload, with the encoding specified below.

**encoding**: This will typically be empty as all messages received from Ably are automatically decoded client-side using this value. However, if the message encoding cannot be processed, this attribute will contain the remaining transformations not applied to the data payload.
**extras**: Extras object. Currently only allows for [push](https://www.ably.io/documentation/general/push/publish#channel-broadcast-example) extra.
**push**
**apns**: Extends and overrides generic values when delivering via APNs. [See examples](https://www.ably.io/documentation/general/push/publish#payload-structure)
**notification**
**body**: Text below title on the expanded notification.
**collapseKey**: Platform-specific, used to group notifications together.
**icon**: Platform-specific icon for the notification.
**sound**: Platform-specific sound for the notification.
**title**: Title to display at the notification.
**data**: Arbitrary [key-value string-to-string payload](https://www.ably.io/documentation/general/push/publish#channel-broadcast-example).
**fcm**: Extends and overrides generic values when delivering via GCM/FCM. [See examples](https://www.ably.io/documentation/general/push/publish#payload-structure)
**notification**
**body**: Text below title on the expanded notification.
**collapseKey**: Platform-specific, used to group notifications together.
**icon**: Platform-specific icon for the notification.
**sound**: Platform-specific sound for the notification.
**title**: Title to display at the notification.
**notification**
**body**: Text below title on the expanded notification.
**collapseKey**: Platform-specific, used to group notifications together.
**icon**: Platform-specific icon for the notification.
**sound**: Platform-specific sound for the notification.
**title**: Title to display at the notification.
**web**: Extends and overrides generic values when delivering via web. [See examples](https://www.ably.io/documentation/general/push/publish#payload-structure)
**notification**
**body**: Text below title on the expanded notification.
**collapseKey**: Platform-specific, used to group notifications together.
**icon**: Platform-specific icon for the notification.
**sound**: Platform-specific sound for the notification.
**title**: Title to display at the notification.
**id**: A Unique ID that can be specified by the publisher for [idempotent publishing](https://www.ably.io/documentation/rest/messages#idempotent).
**name**: The event name, if provided.
**timestamp**: Timestamp when the message was received by the Ably, as milliseconds since the epoch.
